name: Double Magic Blade
effects: Enable unit to use following abilities 2 times in one turn: Mage Blade - Blazing Threat (220700), Mage Blade - Calm Waters (220710), Mage Blade - Roaring Thunder (220720), Mage Blade - Windstorm (220730), Mage Blade - Glittering Light (220740), Firaja Blade (220770), Waterja Blade (220780), Thundaja Blade (220790), Aeoroja Blade (220800)
